about_the_game:
A Tower Defense Game In Reverse

Become the attacker for once. Build your army and guide your Battering Ram along the path, through the maze of obstacles and fortifications to the enemy castle.

Protect the Ram at all costs

Your Battering Ram is your most important unit. If it dies the siege is over. It is also your most powerful. Guide it through the enemy castle and bring down every gate and obstacle in your way.

Call the banners. Build your army. It's time for a siege.

Build out your army with the rewards of the previous attack. Choose from archers, swordsman and much more to defend your Battering Ram and claim another castle for your Kingdom.

Use the banner system to command your soldiers on the field of battle.

Army Dead? Step into action and become the King you were born to be.

Use your bow to pick off approaching enemies from a distance and swing your sword to take out groups of enemies in one fell swoop.

Current Features (More Coming Soon):

  • 5 playable levels

  • Minimalist art style

  • A simplistic approach to strategy games

  • High score system

short_description: Call the banners. Prepare your army. The siege has begun. Toon Siege is a minimalist action strategy game about building an army and attacking castles. Guide your battering ram and soldiers through the maze of obstacles and fortifications to reach the enemy castle and become its new King
